children.subject: <md>Looks like the link on the website's still open. Doesn't hurt to apply anyways.</md>
I was sick and missed the deadline. Is there a chance to submit an application late?
Hopefully they'll send us an email no matter if we get accepted.

Alright looking at last year: 
the deadline for the application was April 12th 
They read all of the applications by May 4th
They sent Decisions on May 6th
I wouldn't expect any action until next week.

<md>nope. Amit did email last week and say they are gonna send out interview invites towards middle/end of this week so I'm going to start worrying on Friday lol. 

</md>
Have you guys heard back? Today is Friday haha
<md>Nope. I'm already worrying about CS 61C though so I can't worry about this at the same time lol</md>

history.content:
Announcing the 2022-2023 Accel Scholars Program!
 
Accel Scholars is an exclusive partnership between Silicon Valley venture capital firm Accel and UC Berkeley’s EECS department.
 
Over the course of the school year, Accel will provide personalized mentorship and career guidance, bolstering students' professional network with engineering and product leaders from leading companies, and teaches them a curriculum of practical, industry-related, subjects such as fundraising, networking, career tradeoffs, rebounding from failure, and more.
 
Accel Scholars is open to all undergraduate students at UC Berkeley, but their programming is most applicable to intended or accepted CS, EECS, and data science majors. We do not have a GPA or age minimum.
 
Accel Scholars is filled with a lifelong network of the most talented and amazing people I'm surprised I never met while I was a student at Cal, and it makes a huge school feel a whole lot smaller and more tight-knit even after graduating, 
- Felipe Campos (Class of 20-21) 
 
I've gotten more and more value from the program far past my Berkeley graduation. Most clubs and programs at Berkeley help you navigate your time in college, but Accel Scholars goes beyond that and gives you the knowledge, community, and tools to navigate your career. I also continue to meet amazing people year after year, many of whom have become my closest friends. 
- Olivia Koshy (Class of 17-18) 
 
To apply for Accel's 2022-2023 program, please visit the Accel Scholars page on the EECS website . The application deadline is April 1st at 11:59 pm.
Accel_scholars_summary.pdf
history.subject: 2022-2023 Accel Scholars Program - DEADLINE APPROACHING
